summary:
I have a hands-on management approach, I am self-motivated, flexible and a team player. I have a passion for the hospitality and catering industry which gives me the edge to read people and encourage them to achieve the highest standards required to function in a day. I have a wealth of experience which gives me the freedom to take on most situations with great confidence. According to former colleagues and Managers I am a team player that always looks at both the interest of the client, company and the staff, an individual that can get a job done in time and within the parameters set out. Always willing to run the extra mile and always motivated, An individual that can work independently and as part of a team. 
I have a proven track record with budget and inventory control and have developed a reputation for sound cost control. In my curently roll as Factory Dairy operator I am Running a small 2000lt per hour Pasteurization instalation with the capabilaty of cream production and homogenising capabilities. We operate with a Galdi gr50 gable top filling machine with a capasaty of 2500lt per hour. We produce day fresh dairy products such as full Milk, Yoghurt, Kwark & Cheese.  I coordinate a team of up to 15. my days a filled with farm inspections RMO coordenations to the cleaning and maintenance of the factory.  Working hand in hand with our in house safty manager in HACCP reviews to insuring the best quality. 
With 20 years’ catering experience, 5 years in remote site (Off shore Camp Boss, Chef trainer,  Catering Laundry, cleaning, crew changes, maintenance and waste management)
to running my own Organic raw milk cheese company for 7 years in Northern Ireland, to my latest relocation to the Nederlands in 2019. I have showed a great deal of skill, to adapt and find inovatif traning methods to train  multi-cultural staff and find away to be at the forefront of a ever so changing food industry jet still staying true to grandmas recipes.Offshore procurement, stock control and stock rotation. 
Expenditure Reports, Cost Control, & Budget controls.  The effective implementation & managing of company standards, systems & controls, ensuring correct HACCP & COSSH.  
Establishing a proven track record for working with the maintenance department developing preventative maintenance and fault reports. 

•	Excellent communication skills
•	Leading factorys & catering outlets with teamsof 30+ 
•	Inventory management and control
Operational planing and sceduling 
•	Menu preparation and maintenance
•	Hands on attitude, also a team player
•	Innovative Approach to marketing
